amendment.description: To repeal the 1993 tax increase on Social Security benefits.

vote.text: Amendment SA 241 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 55 - 45. Record Vote Number: 74.

action.text: Amendment SA 241 proposed by Senator Bunning. (consideration: CR S2914-2915, S2933; text: CR S2914) To repeal the 1993 tax increase on Social Security benefits.
